description:
Often times, we seem to not know whether a certain knowledge is effective or not. Here in this course, I will include the lessons that helped me to live with more radiant energy and to look at life with much more clarity that some of you may see as unorthodox. But I assure you that these timeless wisdom will work on you just as much as they did on me if you can give these lessons your genuine attention.

Your genuine attention is all I am asking. That`s it.
title: Feeling the Light Within: Timeless Wisdom to be Joyful
